sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { FaGithub, FaLinkedin, FaEnvelope, FaMoon, FaSun } from "react-icons/fa"; import projects from "./projects"; import skills from "./skills"; import "./App.css"; // Experience data const experience = [ { role: "AI/ML Intern", company: "Edunet Foundation", location: "Remote", date: "Dec 2024", details: [ "Improved object recognition model from 78% to 92%.", "Documented tuning logs and worked on real-world ML pipeline.", ], }, { role: "Data Visualization Simulation Intern", company: "TCS Forage Internship", location: "Remote", date: "Dec 2024", details: [ "Created Power BI dashboards from Excel data to simulate executive reporting.", "Analyzed data and presented strategic insights.", ], }, ]; // Education data const education = [ { institution: "Saraswati College of Engineering, Mumbai University", degree: "B.Tech in Computer Science (AI/ML Specialization)", location: "Navi Mumbai, MH", date: "Aug 2027", }, { institution: "Gyanodaya Junior College", degree: "HSC (Computer Science)", location: "Maharashtra, India", date: "2022", }, ]; // Certifications data const certifications = [ "AI Essentials – Udemy", "Python Training – Simplilearn", "Generative AI: Model Generation – NxtWave", "AI Tools Certified – be10x", ]; export default function App() { const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = useState(false); return (
{/* NAVBAR */}
Sushantmani Tripathi
About Skills Projects Experience Education Certs Résumé
{/* HERO SECTION */}

Sushantmani Tripathi

AI Student & End-to-End ML Storyteller

Experimenting with federated learning (latest insights!)
GitHub LinkedIn Email
{/* ABOUT SECTION */}
👨‍💻

About Me

AI-focused student crafting solutions across the ML pipeline—problem formulation, data wrangling, model tuning, deployment, and results reflection.
My portfolio is a living story, evolving as I learn and build, showcasing both technical skill and creative problem solving.

  • 🎓 B.Tech Computer Science (AI/ML Specialization), Saraswati College of Engineering, Mumbai University, Navi Mumbai, MH
  • 🏆 Hackathons, Kaggle Competitions, Open Source Contributions
  • 💡 Motivated to drive innovation and positive impact with ML
{/* SKILLS SECTION */}
🧠

Skills Matrix

{skills.map((skill) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* PROJECTS SECTION */}
🚀

Featured Projects

{projects.map((proj, i) => (

{proj.title}

{proj.tech || "AI/ML"}
Problem: {proj.problem}
Data Selection: {proj.data}
Feature Engineering: {proj.features}
Model Choice: {proj.model}
Results & Visualization: {proj.results}
Lessons Learned: {proj.lessons}
Future Steps: {proj.future}
{proj.demo && ( 🚀 Live Demo )} {proj.github && ( Source )}
))}
{/* EXPERIENCE SECTION */}
📈

Experience

{experience.map((exp, i) => (

{exp.role} @ {exp.company}

{exp.location} | {exp.date}
    {exp.details.map((d, j) =>
  • {d}
    • )}
))}
{/* EDUCATION SECTION */}
🎓

Education

{education.map((edu, i) => (

{edu.institution}

{edu.degree}

{edu.location} | {edu.date}
))}
{/* CERTIFICATIONS SECTION */}
📜

Certifications

    {certifications.map((cert, i) =>
  • {cert}
    • )}
{/* RESUME SECTION */}
📄

Résumé

⬇️ Download Résumé (PDF)
{/* FOOTER */}
GitHub LinkedIn Email

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Sushantmani Tripathi

); }
